name: Queppelin Technology Solutions Pvt. Ltd.
overview:
Queppelin is an India based mobile app development company and has invested heavily in mobile product platforms on Android, iPhone, J2me, Blackberry and Windows.

Our flagship innovation, a ‘mobile content streaming platform’, helps connect the content creators with the content consumers. In a country with limited entertainment options & almost no private space, our technology helps users seek entertainment from their mobile itself. We target to do this by helping content creators like media and publishing companies quickly get on to the mobile wave and be able to deliver their content to mobile masses. We help the media & internet companies quickly fulfill their convergence needs by distributing their content via mobile and we help the telecom operators engage their existing users. This is done via various product lines such as streaming media platforms and social games.

Queppelin focuses heavily on Indian content providers like Bollywood content aggregators, media companies, regional content providers and TV Reality Shows. We work closely with content providers to build a product and then help them distribute their product via pre-installation deals with handset manufacturers and distribution deals with telecom operators.
